gm web3

all my web3 bros in s5 @_nightsweekends can hit me up for copywriting advice. 

whether it's a hook for a post or a super complicated whitepaper you want to write about, we'll figure it out together (: 

who's first? https://t.co/wzOu3Bgrtd
